chapter.title: What's new
chapter.para: Bean Validation 1.1 focused on improving and build upon Bean Validation 1.0. The expert group and the community have been working of a few specific areas.

section.title: Openness
section.para: All of Bean Validation 1.1 work has been done in the open and in an open source way. You can find all the details (mailing lists, source repositories etc) at http://beanvalidation.org.

section.title: Dependency injection
section.para: Bean Validation objects and specifically ConstraintValidator instances allow dependency injection. CDI (or any dependency injection framework) has means to inject objects into ConstraintValidator instances. CDI integration is activated in Java EE 7 automatically.
